titleInfo.title: Granville Davis, former Rhodes College faculty, 1979

mods.abstract: Interview with Granville Davis, a professor at Rhodes College, formerly known as Southwestern. He talks about the influence VECA, Southwestern, and a nearby synagogue had on shaping and stabilizing the surrounding community throughout the years. Davis also mentions a brief history of Southwestern and the college's move to its current location off of North Parkway. This interview was conducted in 1979. ï¿½
